document_data.mainbody:
A Blight in the Darkness is an adventure module set in the Forgotten Realms using the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition ruleset. It is part of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures published for the D&D Adventurers League. It focuses on Icewind Dale, and is an adventure designed for 5 to 10-level characters.
Characters
Clod • Feral-Tongue • Kaskur Spearsong • Ogolai Orcsplitter
Creatures
chardalyn growth • dire wolf • goliath • mud mephit • polar bear • water elemental
Events
Everlasting Rime
Location
Region Icewind Dale
Wilderness Wyrmdoom Crag
Magic
Items armor of necrotic resistance • spell scroll of spider climb • wand of pyrotechnics
Potions Potion of healing • Potion of resistance
Spells blight • call lightning • contagion • cure wounds • dispel magic • divination • druidcraft • entangle • flame blade • freedom of movement • greater restoration • guardian of nature • identify • lesser restoration • moonbeam • pass without trace • plant growth • prayer of healing • produce flame • raise dead • remove curse • revivify • speak with dead • thorn whip • thunderwave • true resurrection
* D&D Adventurers League Guildmaster Chris Lindsay
* D&D Adventurers League Wizards Team Brandy Camel, Lea Helotis, Chris Lindsay, Chris Tulach
* D&D Adventurers League Administrator(s) Ma’at Crook, Amy Lynn Dzura, Claire Hoffman, Greg Marks, Alan Patrick, Travis Woodall
* Art Director and Graphic Designer Rich Lescouflair
* Interior Art Jedd Chevrier, Olly Lawson, Lee Moyer, April Prime, Svetlin Velinov
* Puzzle Illustration Samantha Santiago
* Playtesters Dan Beam, Daniel Franco, Gregory Harris, Chris McGovern, Daniel Oliveira, Dave Rosser, James Schweiss, Jia Jian Tin, Marcello Velazquez
